title: Rogers Communications Down Over 6%, On Pace for Largest Percent Decrease Since June 2013 — Data Talk
text:
Rogers Communications Inc. Class B (RCI.B.T) is currently at C$62.27, down C$4.12 or 6.21%

-- Would be lowest close since July 3, 2018, when it closed at C$62.19

-- On pace for largest percent decrease since June 26, 2013, when it fell 9.2%

-- Earlier Wednesday, Rogers Communications reported third-quarter net income of C$593 million on total revenue of C$3.75 billion

-- The company updated its 2019 outlook to a total revenue decrease of 1% to an increase of 1%

-- Snaps a three day winning streak

-- Down 3.5% month-to-date; on pace for worst month since Aug. 2019, when it fell 3.8%

-- Down 10.99% year-to-date; on pace for worst year since 2009, when it fell 10.66%

-- Down 8.13% from 52 weeks ago (Oct. 24, 2018), when it closed at C$67.78

-- Would be a new 52 week closing low

-- Traded as low as C$61.88; lowest intraday level since July 5, 2018, when it hit C$61.86

-- Down 6.79% at today's intraday low; largest intraday percent decrease since June 26, 2013, when it fell as much as 10.11%

All data as of 11:26:39 AM

Source: Dow Jones Market Data, FactSet

(END) Dow Jones Newswires
